sect2.title: Configuring Mozilla
sect2.para: No specific configuration is required as long as the mozilla binary is in the path for the user. If you have installed mozilla in a non-standard location such as &mozilla-prefix;, then make a sym-link to the mozilla binary from /usr/bin.
